result.title: Submission to the Global Stocktake
result.description: This deliverable will be a formal submission to the Global Stocktake under the UNFCCCs Paris Agreement The document will synthesise key findings from the Sectoral Conversations WP1 Global Benchmarks WP2 and Sectoral Modelling WP3 Sectoral Transformation Challenges WP4 and insights from the governance research WP6 as relevant to the assessment of collective progress towards achieving the goals of the Paris Agreement

result.title: Report and academic article manuscript with a comparative analysis across the target countries on how their NDCs have so far been implemented
result.description: The deliverable will synthesise the analysis of the state of implementation of current NDCs across a range of countries The deliverable is targeted towards an academic audience The deliverable will contain an article manuscript for submission in a peerreviewed academic journal

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: This deliverable will outline how data generated in this project will be handled according to the FAIR findable accessible interoperable reusable It will cover data management and storage including organizational and procedural requirements open access ethical aspects of data generation as well as issues related to privacy and protection of personal data

result.title: Report and academic article manuscript with a comparative analysis across the target countries on which factors helped or hindered ambition raising in the 2020 NDCs
